iep_goals: Articulate speech sounds clearly in conversation with 90% intelligibility to unfamiliar listeners
Use appropriate voice volume and rate during presentations with 85% accuracy
accommodations: Allow extra time for verbal responses
Provide alternative methods for oral presentations
Access to speech-generating device when needed
learning_styles: excels with written expression over verbal communication
benefits from technology supports for communication

interviews.parent: Parent reports Lucas is academically gifted but avoids speaking situations. He wants to study computer science.
interviews.teacher: Lucas produces excellent written work and demonstrates deep understanding but rarely participates in class discussions.

observations.psychologist: Above-average intellectual abilities with significant speech fluency challenges impacting academic participation and social interaction.
